example.text: We need increased diversity in individual corporations and across the business sector. Yet, punishing companies for private, corporate choices encouraging diversity has become an element of [[user]]'s platform: from DC to Disney. So much for combatting fraud, waste, and abuse. [[url]]
As a member of [[user]], I'm committed to developing bipartisan solutions that build the strength and resilience of the American economy. [[url]]

In addition to voting for these bills, I've introduced legislation to support patients with mental and physical health comorbidities, improve the outcomes of federal programs that serve the public, and expand the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) so it is more inclusive. In summary, I've cosponsored or introduced 199 bills so far this year to protect our people and promote our community's most precious values.

The Default On America Act passed in the House last month would put nearly one million SNAP recipients at risk of losing their benefits. Newsflash, [[user]]: taking food from people doesn’t help them find work — it just makes them hungry. [[url]]

We need increased diversity in individual corporations and across the business sector. Yet, punishing companies for private, corporate choices encouraging diversity has become an element of [[user]]'s platform: from DC to Disney. So much for combatting fraud, waste, and abuse. [[url]]
For more information regarding legislation I've introduced and cosponsored this Congress, visit my website . This week, Israeli President Isaac Herzog made a historic visit to the United States.

In addition to voting for these bills, I've introduced legislation to support patients with mental and physical health comorbidities, improve the outcomes of federal programs that serve the public, and expand the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) so it is more inclusive. In summary, I've cosponsored or introduced 199 bills so far this year to protect our people and promote our community's most precious values.
